title: Robot CRX FANUC
description:
Even before your cobot is delivered to your company, the CRX FANUC app guides you through a new automation experience through a series of initiation modules:

-Discovery of the CRX cobot
- Unpacking and starting your cobot
- Step-by-step learning, in video, of the different functionalities
 
Le Fil d’Actu is regularly fed with articles or videos concerning the latest developments and updates of the CRX cobot. Don't forget to activate notifications to be informed in preview!
 
Lacking inspiration to increase your productivity and guarantee the well-being of your employees? The Practical Cases section will certainly give you ideas thanks to the feedback from our customers.
 
Among the other features of the CRX FANUC app, you will also find:
-Technical documentation
-The catalog of accessories compatible with the CRX
-Information on the CRX Expert training
-CRX-related events (fairs, webinars, technical days)
  
So don't wait any longer to join the CRX FANUC user community!
descriptionHTML:
Even before your cobot is delivered to your company, the CRX FANUC app guides you through a new automation experience through a series of initiation modules:

-Discovery of the CRX cobot
- Unpacking and starting your cobot
- Step-by-step learning, in video, of the different functionalities

Le Fil d’Actu is regularly fed with articles or videos concerning the latest developments and updates of the CRX cobot. Don't forget to activate notifications to be informed in preview!

Lacking inspiration to increase your productivity and guarantee the well-being of your employees? The Practical Cases section will certainly give you ideas thanks to the feedback from our customers.

Among the other features of the CRX FANUC app, you will also find:
-Technical documentation
-The catalog of accessories compatible with the CRX
-Information on the CRX Expert training
-CRX-related events (fairs, webinars, technical days)

So don't wait any longer to join the CRX FANUC user community!
